attributes.action: Save the Wispa chocolate bar and get Cadbury's to continue with production
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In October 2007 Cadbury chocolates brought back the Wispa due to popular demand but only on a trial period.  Most retailers have now run out of stock.  Please help to convince Cadbury that the Wispa should be a permanent product and embodies the era of 1980's Britain and surely the fact that stocks have ran out already proves that this chocolate bar must be kept in permanent production.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
